cloud.name: Haven Outpost
cloud.description: A peaceful survivor settlement. Welcoming to most wastelanders.

fire.name: Inferno Gang
fire.description: Built near a volcanic vent. Specialists in fire and explosives.

sword.name: Steel Brotherhood
sword.description: Weapon masters. Their fighters are among the deadliest.

temple.name: The Sanctuary
temple.description: A community of healers. Known for their defensive capabilities.

taoist.name: Tech Cult
taoist.description: Worshippers of pre-war technology. Fast learners.

blood.name: Blood Raiders
blood.description: Ruthless raiders. Powerful but dangerous to join.

lotus.name: Blue Lotus Militia
lotus.description: Precision fighters. Masters of blade combat.

xuantian.name: Vault Dwellers
xuantian.description: Survivors from an ancient vault. Deep resources.

star.name: Stargazers
star.description: Mysterious group studying pre-war satellite technology.

dragon.name: Mutant Legion
dragon.description: A faction of powerful mutants. Strong bloodlines.

thunder.name: Thunder Legion
thunder.description: Controls power generators. Masters of electricity.

ice.name: Frost Bunker
ice.description: Survivors from a frozen bunker. Strong defense.

yinyang.name: Balance Keepers
yinyang.description: Believe in balance. Well-rounded in all areas.

purpleFlower.name: Mutant Blossom
purpleFlower.description: Rare crafting material. Grows on irradiated cliffs.

cleansePill.name: Cleanse Chem
cleansePill.description: Removes radiation poisoning. Slightly increases max health.

beastCore.name: Mutant Core
beastCore.description: Core from a powerful mutant beast.
